description: You can't beat a hot cup of chocolate to warm up during&nbsp;winter. But you can take it up a notch by adding Fireball whiskey! A Fireball Hot Chocolate tastes like a savory explosion of cinnamon flavor wrapped in a smooth, velvety blanket of&nbsp;chocolate deliciousness.It features the perfect balance of sweetness and decadence that results in a perfect combination of flavors for wintertime!
